original: ENESTRÖM, Hugo Mauritz, Ingenjör, Stockholm, f Norrköping 17/1 76, gm Elsa Landen. Tekn stud i Sv o Tyskl. Har anlagt textil-fabr o övervakat mont av maskinerna t dessa. Vkst dir i Hdls- o Entreprenad AB Fenja i Sthlm. Har företagit omfatt stud.resor t Tyskl, Engl, Skottl o Belg. Fd Idstomr.befh, bat.chef. Hobbies: Ridsport, jakt.
translated: ENESTRÖM, Hugo Mauritz, Engineer, Stockholm, b. Norrköping 17/1 1876, m. Elsa Landen. Technical studies in Sweden and Germany. Has constructed textile factories and supervised the installation of the machines in them. Executive director in Trade and Construction Company Fenja in Stockholm. Has undertaken extensive study trips to Germany, England, Scotland, and Belgium. Former industrial commander, battalion commander. Hobbies: Equestrian sports, hunting.

structured.name: Hugo Mauritz Eneström

education.name: Technical studies in Sweden and Germany

structured.description: Hugo Mauritz Eneström was born on January 17, 1876, in Norrköping, Sweden. He was an engineer and had constructed textile factories, overseeing the installation of machines. He served as the Executive Director of Trade and Construction Company Fenja in Stockholm. Hugo undertook extensive study trips to Germany, England, Scotland, and Belgium. He had previous experience as an industrial commander and battalion commander. His hobbies included equestrian sports and hunting.
